description: This module provides the essential concepts, methodologies, tools and techniques for effective process hazard analysis. Topics covered include the various approaches to conducting process hazard analysis and the use of hazard identification tools and and evaluation techniques such as Hazard and Operability (HAZOP) Analysis, What-if Analysis (WIA), Failure Modes and Effects Analysis (FMEA), Fault Tree Analysis (FTA), Event Tree Analysis (ETA), Bowtie Analysis and the Layer of Protection Analysis (LOPA) methodology.
title: Process Hazard Analysis
